mapper.select: SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.likeCnt , tbmt.viewCnt , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname , IF(tlkm.likeNo,1,0) AS isLiked FROM tbBoardMaster tbmt INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo LEFT JOIN tbLIkeMaster tlkm ON tlkm.targetNo = tbmt.boardNo AND tlkm.likeTypeCd = '003001' AND tlkm.regUser = #{loginMemNo} WHERE tbmt.viewType = '01' AND tbmt.boardTypeCd = #{boardTypeCd} ORDER BY tbmt.regDt DESC

SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.likeCnt , tbmt.viewCnt , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname , IF(tlkm.likeNo,1,0) AS isLiked , tmbm.nickNm FROM tbBoardMaster tbmt INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo INNER JOIN tbMemberMaster tmbm ON tmbm.memNo = tbmt.regUser AND tmbm.viewType = '01' INNER JOIN tbMemberProfile tmpf ON tmpf.memNo = tmbm.memNo INNER JOIN tbProfileMaster tpfm ON tpfm.profileNo = tmpf.profileNo LEFT JOIN tbLIkeMaster tlkm ON tlkm.targetNo = tbmt.boardNo AND tlkm.likeTypeCd = '003001' AND tlkm.regUser = #{loginMemNo} WHERE tbmt.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND tbmt.viewType = '01'

SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname FROM tbRecommendMaster trcm INNER JOIN tbBoardMaster tbmt ON trcm.targetNo = tbmt.boardNo AND tbmt.boardTypeCd = '002001' AND tbmt.viewType = '01' INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo WHERE trcm.viewType = '01' AND trcm.targetTypeCd ='002001' ORDER BY
RAND(),
trcm.sortNo ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbBoardMaster ( boardTypeCd, title, contents, viewType, viewCnt, regUser, regDt ) VALUES ( #{boardTypeCd}, #{title}, #{contents}, '01', 0, #{loginMemNo}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO tbBoardUgc ( boardNo, ugcTypeCd, useReply, useNickname ) VALUES( #{boardNo}, #{ugcTypeCd}, #{useReply}, #{useNickname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbBoardMaster SET likeCnt=IFNULL(likeCnt,0) + 1 WHERE boardNo=#{targetNo}
UPDATE tbBoardMaster SET likeCnt=likeCnt - 1 WHERE boardNo=#{targetNo}
mapper.select: SELECT tbdr.replyNo , tbdr.boardNo , tbdr.parentNo , tbdr.title , tbdr.contents , tbdr.sortNo , tbdr.regUser , tbdr.regDt , tbdr.updUser , tbdr.updDt FROM tbBoardReply tbdr INNER JOIN tbBoardMaster tbdm ON tbdr.boardNo = tbdm.boardNo WHERE tbdr.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND tbdm.viewType = '01' ORDER BY tbdr.regDt ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbBoardReply ( boardNo, parentNo, title, contents, sortNo, regUser, regDt ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{parentNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{sortNo}, #{loginMemNo}, NOW() )
